page.title: 06HAILSHAM LEISURE CENTRE 2
page.content: We interviewed{50 people}about the Hailsham Leisure Centre and this is our result: { { 38%}use the Leisure Centre. {92%}think that a swimming pool will improve it. {57%}of the people who use it are young. {Squash}is the most popular activity, with{21%. {Swimming}is the most popular activity out of the Centre. Most people who do not use the Centre are too busy or live too far away. Out of the people who use it {24%}use it once a week and{ { 14%}use it once a month. {But 12%}think that their facility is expensive!
